code: @Override public Action.Result execute(String actionId, WatchExecutionContext ctx, Payload payload) throws Exception {     Map<String, Object> model = Variables.createCtxParamsMap(ctx, payload).     HttpRequest request = action.requestTemplate.render(templateEngine, model).     if (ctx.simulateAction(actionId)) {         return new WebhookAction.Result.Simulated(request).     }     HttpResponse response = httpClient.execute(request).     if (response.status() >= 400) {         return new WebhookAction.Result.Failure(request, response).     } else {         return new WebhookAction.Result.Success(request, response).     } }
